content.rendered:
Designed for the style-conscious, this sofa set caters to those who appreciate the harmonious marriage of aesthetics and functionality. The sleek lines and contemporary design make it a visual delight, while the premium materials guarantee a lasting investment in both style and comfort.

Readily adaptable to various occasions, the Sierra Sofa becomes the canvas for your unique style expression. Whether hosting guests or enjoying quiet moments, this sofa promises a statement piece that effortlessly complements your modern home.

excerpt.rendered:
Indulge in modern luxury with the Sierra 6 Seater L-Shape Sofa. Its modular design offers versatile arrangements, ensuring both style and comfort. Plush cushions and premium materials make this sofa a statement piece for contemporary living.

Make the Sierra 5 Seater L-Shape Sofa your own and redefine your living space with a touch of contemporary luxury. Embrace the modular design, plush comfort, and enduring style—transform your home today.

Attribute Specification
Dimensions 9 ft by 6 ft (when assembled, all pieces)
Materials Kikkar Wood Frame (0.75 inches thick)
Configuration L-Shape, 6 Seater
Color Options Grey, Green, Beige, Black
Poshish Material Jute
Made To Order Yes

*Note: All Of Our Items Are Made to Order.*
